_Description: When changing any of the listed settings, copy the relevant parts into `BATTLETECH/Mods/ModTek/ModTekPreloader.config.json`.
Harmony12XEnabled_Description: Enables Harmony X and its shims for Harmony 1 and 2, does work pretty well but not perfectly and some mods might need to be updated.
Harmony12XLogChannelFilter_Description: The channels to log into `BATTLETECH/Mods/.modtek/HarmonyFileLog.log`: None=0 Info=2 IL=4 Warn=8 Error=16 Debug=32 All=62
Harmony12XFakeAssemblyLocationEnabled_De: Make Assembly.Location return the path of the original non-shimmed assembly and not the path to the shimmed assembly. Workaround to some mods expecting their assembly to be in their respective mod directory.
